sn2.27:1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho nando devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn2.27:2: "Accenti kālā tarayanti rattiyo,Vayoguṇā anupubbaṁ jahanti;Etaṁ bhayaṁ maraṇe pekkhamāno,Puññāni kayirātha sukhāvahānī"ti.
sn2.27:3: "Accenti kālā tarayanti rattiyo,Vayoguṇā anupubbaṁ jahanti;Etaṁ bhayaṁ maraṇe pekkhamāno,Lokāmisaṁ pajahe santipekkho"ti.
